name: Blackberry Dumplings
author: Charlotte Hooper
instructions: In saucepan, cook blackberries, water, sugar and cinnamon. Bring to a boil. In the meantime, mix flour and Crisco together. Add enough water to make a soft dough. Roll dough out and cut with pizza cutter or knife like dumplings. Drop in boiling mixture. Cook until tender. Approximately five minutes. Serve hot.
